title: RStudio: rstudio::conf 2020
description: The conference for all things R and RStudio.

title: RStudio: Instructor Training
description: This workshop is the first step in becoming a certified RStudio instructor. It is run online for four hours on each of two days at a time suitable for participants in Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Please fill in this form if you wish to take part.

title: RStudio: Instructor Training
description: This workshop is the first step in becoming a certified RStudio instructor, and takes place online for four hours on each of two days at a time suitable for participants in the Americas. Please fill in this form if you wish to take part.

title: RStudio: Instructor Training
description: This workshop is the first step in becoming a certified RStudio instructor, and takes place online for four hours on each of two days at a time suitable for participants in Asia and the Western Pacific. (Please note that the dates given are UTC: the class will start at 6:30 am in New Delhi and noon in Sydney.) If you wish to take part, please fill in this form.
